name: BNNSLayerParametersActivation
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of an activation layer.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new activation layer parameters structure.

items.name: init(i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, activation: BNNSActivation, axis_flags: UInt32)
items.desc: Returns a new activation layer parameters structure from the supplied descriptors, activation function, and axis flags.

items.name: var activation: BNNSActivation
items.desc: The activation function that the layer applies to the output.

items.name: var axis_flags: UInt32
items.desc: Flags that indicate axes on which to apply certain activation functions.
